elements.name: Frage1
elements.title: When we experience something (even unconsciously), our brain stores positive or negative feelings in the ....
elements.correctAnswer: When we experience something (even unconsciously), our brain stores positive or negative feelings in our emotional experience memory.

elements.name: Frage2
elements.title: When we have to make (purchasing) decisions, then ...
elements.correctAnswer: When we have to make (purchasing) decisions, we fall back on the feelings stored in our emotional memory.

elements.name: Frage3
elements.title: When we see a product, our buying behavior is not determined by our knowledge of the product, but ...
elements.correctAnswer: When we see a product, it is not our knowledge of the product that determines our purchasing behavior, but our stored feelings about the brand.

elements.name: Frage4
elements.title: For example, if a fashion brand promises success, then a ... towards the brand arises.
elements.correctAnswer: If a fashion brand promises success, for example, this creates a positive feeling towards the brand.

elements.name: Frage5
elements.title: If ..., then we buy the product of this brand in the supermarket despite good alternatives.
elements.correctAnswer: If we associate a brand with a positive feeling, then we will buy the product of that brand in the supermarket despite good alternatives.

elements.name: Frage6
elements.title: If ..., then we automatically buy status and reputation.
elements.correctAnswer: When we buy a Mercedes, for example, we automatically buy status and prestige.
